highlight.cpp-parameters.excludeRegexes.title: Exclude regexes
highlight.cpp-parameters.excludeRegexes.markdownDescription: Set the exclude regexes in editor.

highlight.cpp-parameters.languageIds.title: Language Ids
highlight.cpp-parameters.languageIds.markdownDescription: Set the language ID for activate the highlight.

highlight.cpp-parameters.parameterDecora.markdownDescription: Set decoration of parameters following at [API docs decoration](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions).

after.title: after
after.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted after the decorated text.

backgroundColor.title: backgroundColor
backgroundColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

border.title: border
border.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

borderColor.title: borderColor
borderColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

color.title: color
color.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

contentIconPath.title: contentIconPath
contentIconPath.description: An absolute path or an URI to an image to be rendered in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

contentText.title: contentText
contentText.description: Defines a text content that is shown in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

fontStyle.title: fontStyle
fontStyle.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

fontWeight.title: fontWeight
fontWeight.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

height.title: height
height.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

margin.title: margin
margin.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

textDecoration.title: textDecoration
textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

width.title: width
width.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

backgroundColor.title: backgroundColor
backgroundColor.description: Background color of the decoration. Use rgba() and define transparent background colors to play well with other decorations.

before.title: before
before.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted after the decorated text.

gutterIconPath.title: gutterIconPath
gutterIconPath.description: An absolute path or an URI to an image to be rendered in the gutter.

gutterIconSize.title: gutterIconSize
gutterIconSize.description: Specifies the size of the gutter icon. Available values are 'auto', 'contain', 'cover' and any percentage value.

isWholeLine.title: isWholeLine
isWholeLine.description: Should the decoration be rendered also on the whitespace after the line text. Defaults to false.

letterSpacing.title: letterSpacing
letterSpacing.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

opacity.title: opacity
opacity.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

outline.title: outline
outline.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

outlineColor.title: outlineColor
outlineColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'outline' for setting one or more of the individual outline properties.

outlineStyle.title: outlineStyle
outlineStyle.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'outline' for setting one or more of the individual outline properties.

outlineWidth.title: outlineWidth
outlineWidth.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'outline' for setting one or more of the individual outline properties.

overviewRulerColor.title: overviewRulerColor
overviewRulerColor.description: The color of the decoration in the overview ruler. Use rgba() and define transparent colors to play well with other decorations.

overviewRulerLane.title: overviewRulerLane
overviewRulerLane.description: The position in the overview ruler where the decoration should be rendered.(Left=1, Center=2, Right=4, Full=7)

rangeBehavior.title: rangeBehavior
rangeBehavior.description: Customize the growing behavior of the decoration when edits occur at the edges of the decoration's range.(OpenOpen=0, ClosedClosed=1, OpenClosed=2, ClosedOpen=3)

textDecoration.title: textDecoration
textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

overviewRulerLane.description: The position in the overview ruler where the decoration should be rendered.(Left=1, Center=2, Right=4, Full=7)

rangeBehavior.title: rangeBehavior
rangeBehavior.description: Customize the growing behavior of the decoration when edits occur at the edges of the decoration's range.(OpenOpen=0, ClosedClosed=1, OpenClosed=2, ClosedOpen=3)

textDecoration.title: textDecoration
textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

fontStyle.title: fontStyle
fontStyle.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

fontWeight.title: fontWeight
fontWeight.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

gutterIconPath.title: gutterIconPath
gutterIconPath.description: An absolute path or an URI to an image to be rendered in the gutter.

gutterIconSize.title: gutterIconSize
gutterIconSize.description: Specifies the size of the gutter icon. Available values are 'auto', 'contain', 'cover' and any percentage value.

isWholeLine.title: isWholeLine
isWholeLine.description: Should the decoration be rendered also on the whitespace after the line text. Defaults to false.

letterSpacing.title: letterSpacing
letterSpacing.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

after.title: after
after.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted after the decorated text.

backgroundColor.title: backgroundColor
backgroundColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

border.title: border
border.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

borderColor.title: borderColor
borderColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

color.title: color
color.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

contentIconPath.title: contentIconPath
contentIconPath.description: An absolute path or an URI to an image to be rendered in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

contentText.title: contentText
contentText.description: Defines a text content that is shown in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

fontStyle.title: fontStyle
fontStyle.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

fontWeight.title: fontWeight

width.title: width
